entry.title: Thursday: A few clouds. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
